DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Valsartan Versus Placebo Exercise Tolerance Patients With Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic diastolic heart failure Breathlessness physical exertion Uncontrolled hypertension Asthma , COPD , abnormal lung function History stroke , myocardial infarction , heart failure , chest pain , abnormal heart rhythm Liver , kidney , pancreas disease Allergy valsartan Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply
